DataElement.preferredDefinition: The code that describes the statistical characterization of human populations broken down by an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced relating to the consumption of liquids containing ethanol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Demographics Alcohol Consumption Personal Medical History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Statistical characterization of human populations broken down by an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced relating to the consumption of liquids containing ethanol.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: statistical characterization of human populations (or segments of human populations broken down by age or sex or income etc.).

Concepts.definition: The statistical characterization of human populations or segments of human populations (e.g., characterization by age, sex, race, or income).

Property.preferredDefinition: consumption of liquids containing ethanol; includes the behavior of drinking the alcohol.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: Consumption of liquids containing ethanol, including the behaviors associated with drinking the alcohol.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The code that describes the record or narrative description of past events relating to the consumption of liquids containing ethanol.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: consumption of liquids containing ethanol; includes the behavior of drinking the alcohol.:The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: Consumption of liquids containing ethanol, including the behaviors associated with drinking the alcohol.
The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Division of Cancer Control and Population Sciences
